```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(igraph)
library(FNN)        # para k-NN
library(geosphere)  # distancia haversine

df <- read.csv("cine_data.csv")
head(df)

```

```{r}
coords <- df %>% 
  drop_na(lat, lon) %>% 
  select(lat, lon) %>% 
  as.matrix()

# Convertir a radianes (igual que Python)
coords_rad <- coords * pi/180
k <- 6


```

```{r}
nbrs <- get.knn(coords_rad, k = k)
idx <- nbrs$nn.index

```

```{r}
G <- graph_empty(nrow(coords), directed = FALSE)

# AÃ±adir atributos de nodo
V(G)$name <- df$name
V(G)$rating <- df$rating

```
